============================Oculus Room TAN Setup Instruction=====================

1. Make sure you download OculusSDK 1.4 from Oculust website (https://developer.oculus.com/downloads/pc/1.4.0/Oculus_SDK_for_Windows/) and unzip it to the third party folder    (TAN_1.1.1.7\thirdparty)
2. Run the PatchOculusRoom.bat, the script will create the souce file for OculusRoomTAN Demo
3. Start the demo by either opening its own VC project or opening the whole solution for TrueAudioNext
